pages.text: Client OR server sided ($(#e2a3ff)$(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/roadrunner)Download$())$(br2)$(#e2a3ff)My recommonded usage:$()$(br)Download $(bold)RoadRunner 1.4.0$() from CurseForge. Pop it in your mods folder, and boom; your game should start up no problem.$(br2)$(#ff0000)WARNINGS:$()$(br)An unknown incompatibility with BaerCraft that makes servers with pre-existing worlds

unable to fully load up until the mod is removed.$(br2)$(#e2a3ff)Mod info:$()$(br)RoadRunner is an unofficial fork of the popular performance-enhancing Fabric mod Lithium. It aims to improve and optimize mob spawning & AI, world gen, chunk loading, block ticking, explosions, etc.
